task: Native fullscreen for graph, dark mode improvements, UI refinements
message: Deployed native browser fullscreen for graph visualization, dark mode for maps, and collapsible UI elements. Production is live with commit 2742516.

deployed_changes.summary: Add native fullscreen for graph, dark mode map, collapsible UI elements
features: Graph fullscreen using browser's native Fullscreen API (double-click or button)
Dark mode map tiles via CSS filter (softer than dark tile providers)
Simplified node drag behavior (no jarring layout restart)

key_decisions: Used native Fullscreen API instead of portal/modal to avoid DOM manipulation issues
CSS filter approach for dark maps instead of CartoDB dark tiles (too dark)
Removed physics restart after drag to eliminate jarring repositioning
context.testing_done: Manual testing of fullscreen enter/exit, node dragging, dark mode toggle

notes: SPOTIFY REDIRECT ISSUE: Use http://127.0.0.1:3000 instead of http://localhost:3000.
